name: Top Battle
description:
Challenge your friends to hundreds of top categories challenges :

TOP first lady given names
TOP sodas brands
TOP characters in "The Lion King"
Top sports that are played with a racket
TOP US states that border the pacific ocean
Etc..

Search and find the answers in pieces within each TOP board .

Challenge your friends or guest opponents and keep on improving your score.

Be smarter and faster than the others and start climbing the TOP rankings until you reach the TOP of the TOP BATTLE leaderboard !
